alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Otero, southeastern Dona Ana and north central El Paso Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 847 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from 3 miles north of Anthony Gap to 5 miles north of Chaparral to 8 miles north of McGregor Range Base. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeast El Paso, Chaparral, Anthony Gap, McGregor Range Base and Franklin Mountains State Park. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
